Name: Bittersweet Symphony
Ingredients: 20 ml De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Review: This vodka-laced rollercoaster ride of bitter and sweet mainly features apricot and grapefruit.
History: Adapted from a drink created in 2003 by Wayne Collins for Maxxium UK.
Nutrition: One serving of Bittersweet Symphony contains 135 calories
